comments.author: CryptoGemsHunter
comments.body: that´s nice! Didnt know about this project before....went through the website and white paper, solid one. Guess to be a new GEM !!!!!!

comments.author: Bertyda
comments.body: Now it is fall of the market and it is hard to say how long the fall will last.Very few projects now appear and it is very hard to attract attention to the project.How do you plan to develop and to promote your project in so difficult time for all cryptocurrency industry?

comments.author: BudBlockz
comments.body: Quote from: Bertyda on November 17, 2022, 02:31:39 PMNow it is fall of the market and it is hard to say how long the fall will last.Very few projects now appear and it is very hard to attract attention to the project.How do you plan to develop and to promote your project in so difficult time for all cryptocurrency industry?After the fall of the market will be a rise and it is necessary to continue to develop the project even when market falls. It is difficult to attract attention to the project and to develop it during the fall of the market and not all the projects will be able to survive.Only the best projects will be able to survive during the fall of the market, that are really necessary for people and in demand.

comments.author: CongCap
comments.body: Quote from: Bertyda on November 17, 2022, 02:31:39 PMNow it is fall of the market and it is hard to say how long the fall will last.Very few projects now appear and it is very hard to attract attention to the project.How do you plan to develop and to promote your project in so difficult time for all cryptocurrency industry?Hello Bertyda, these are important points and concerns that all investors should have. Our team has each more than a decade working for portfolio companies of tier-1 global funds and have experienced ups and downs in the market. From the investor´s perspective, during red markets you will find good risk-adjusted opportunities. It is very is to invest, specially in altcoins when the market is passing through a uptrend but then you won´t be paying good risk-adjusted returns nor good sharpe ratios. Imagine how easy was to buy crypto during the 2nd semester of 2017 or mid 2021 but then once the pick is reached, investors lose their capital and go away.In summary, solid projects with experienced teams will always prevail. Through hard times like today companies will, of course, find hard time to raise and will need to face valuations reductions. Therefore, we do believe that is right time to launch this project as we will find the best scenario to negoatiate with the Companies that will raise through our platform, that´s good for investors. From the marketing point of view, we partnered with two leading crypto marketing agencies to start promoting our project: Blockma[Suspicious link removed]o and CTM (Crypto Market Traffic), Coinboud is also under negotiation. Pls should you want to get deep on any other topic, let us know. Hard work pays off, let´s shape the way people invest their capital !

comments.author: Crypto_Poetry
comments.body: Is so good to see the development of a tolken that can be use for the all ecosystem. Can you tell us more how members can verify and be sure about the financial health of the companies that will use cong to levarege their business?

comments.author: alertoriole
comments.body: LOL. this can't be real? The AI voices. wowwwww

comments.author: brat111111
comments.body: Quote from: CongCap on November 17, 2022, 05:10:18 PMQuote from: Bertyda on November 17, 2022, 02:31:39 PMNow it is fall of the market and it is hard to say how long the fall will last.Very few projects now appear and it is very hard to attract attention to the project.How do you plan to develop and to promote your project in so difficult time for all cryptocurrency industry?Hello Bertyda, these are important points and concerns that all investors should have. Our team has each more than a decade working for portfolio companies of tier-1 global funds and have experienced ups and downs in the market. From the investor´s perspective, during red markets you will find good risk-adjusted opportunities. It is very is to invest, specially in altcoins when the market is passing through a uptrend but then you won´t be paying good risk-adjusted returns nor good sharpe ratios. Imagine how easy was to buy crypto during the 2nd semester of 2017 or mid 2021 but then once the pick is reached, investors lose their capital and go away.In summary, solid projects with experienced teams will always prevail. Through hard times like today companies will, of course, find hard time to raise and will need to face valuations reductions. Therefore, we do believe that is right time to launch this project as we will find the best scenario to negoatiate with the Companies that will raise through our platform, that´s good for investors. From the marketing point of view, we partnered with two leading crypto marketing agencies to start promoting our project: Blockma[Suspicious link removed]o and CTM (Crypto Market Traffic), Coinboud is also under negotiation. Pls should you want to get deep on any other topic, let us know. Hard work pays off, let´s shape the way people invest their capital !I understand that a falling market is a time of opportunity and the biggest fortunes are always made in a falling market, because you can buy promising tokens at a very attractive price. But not all projects will be able to survive during a falling market.What are you doing to survive in a falling market?

comments.author: CongCap
comments.body: we are currently setting up the initial team. You can take a look at our project´s website. Also, just hired two marketing agencies to start promoting the project. Presale event is opening now. The fall of crypto market does not affect us, we will keep working hard to shape the way people invest their capital. Come together with us

comments.author: CongCap
comments.body: Hi guys, just would like to thank you for trusting in us. The first presale small drop is already 40% fulfilled in just a couple of days. Hard work pays off !!!!!

comments.body: Quote from: CongCap on November 18, 2022, 01:15:45 PMwe are currently setting up the initial team. You can take a look at our project´s website. Also, just hired two marketing agencies to start promoting the project. Presale event is opening now. The fall of crypto market does not affect us, we will keep working hard to shape the way people invest their capital. Come together with us Cryptocurrency came for a long time and it is very good that you start to develop and promote the project during the fall of the market.After the fall will be the rise of the market. It is very simple to attract the attention to the project during the rise of the market but to develop the project during the fall of the market it is necessary to have and experience team.Only during the fall of the market the project can show its real value.

comments.author: Coinmaster2.5
comments.body: During the fall of the market it is very difficult time for  Venture Capital funds, because the price of all tokens falls.What do you plan to do to survive during fall of the market and attract venture investors?

comments.author: Defi_space
comments.body: Quote from: Jayjones on November 19, 2022, 09:11:27 PMthe team is from Brazil?Yes the team is from Brazil. Here is a link to team information on the website of the project https://www.congcap.com/teamBut the CONG  has partners all over the world.
